venue.address_1: Field House, University of New Hampshire, Durham, NH 03824
venue.name: University of New Hampshire Field house

item.description:
SAVE THE DATES! NEW ENGLAND PADDLESPORTS SHOW 2011

March 30 - April 2, 2012

University of New Hampshire Field House in Durham, NH

Hours: Friday 5-9, Saturday 9-6, Sunday 9-4Admission: $7 / Under 16 Free

http://www.ktpevents.com/interior.php/pid/3

Click the link below for $2 off coupon

http://69.175.45.110/uploads/1331153892.pdf

Download Schedule of Events and Seminars

http://69.175.45.110/uploads/1331320463.pdf

If you plan to attend Friday, Saturday or Sunday post the time you plan to be there and if you'd like to meet up with others. This Event has no set time it's a place holder and area for others to make plans to go to this great annual paddling event.
item.name: NEW ENGLAND PADDLESPORTS SHOW 2012 March 30 - April 2
